name: NoWastelandCreationIntended
description:
NoWastelandCreationIntended is a game that I made solo for the Ludum Dare 45 Compo.

Enjoy a fabulous ride through a lovely galaxy, while you try to set the right priorities to win a stupid bet.
NoWastelandCreationIntended is a management game, which challenges you to make the right decisions to travel through a small solar system in minimum time. Explore your surroundings, construct buildings and level up your character to build a spaceship and start with nothing, except your skills and knowledge, to the next planet!
